Crema Finance
A Powerful Concentrated Liquidity Protocol.
Concentrated Liquidity Market Maker
The CLMM algorithm designed by Crema allows users to set their desired price ranges flexibly when adding liquidity.
Say Goodbye To Impermanent Loss
Protected by CLMM price bands, liquidity providers can enjoy the best capital efficiency with impermanent loss eliminated.
Ready-To-Integrate DeFi Module
The concentrated liquidity protocol of Crema can be easily integrated to any DAPPs in Solana ecosystem to aggregate the market depth.
